attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Request that the Government listen to the voters of Northumberland that have already spoken overwhelmingly in favour of a 2 unitary authority and not impose a single authority which it would seem you intend to do from 2009.  IT might make people more interested in politics if the politicians that are remote in London LISTEN to the Electorate that has already spoken with their votes.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
